div.head: 野雞瘺瘡痔瘺土撥鼠：主 野雞瘺瘡野雞瘺痔
div.div: wild fowl fistula sore wild fowl fistula sores wild fowl fistula piles

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.orth: 野雞瘺瘡痔瘺土撥鼠：主 野雞瘺瘡野雞瘺痔
form.pron: Ye ji lou chuang zhi lou BCSY tu ba shu Ye ji lou zhi

entry.def: wild fowl fistula sore wild fowl fistula sores wild fowl fistula piles

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhi lou 痔瘺 , piles fistula. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry jin xian fan 金綫礬： 主野雞瘺痔，惡瘡疥癬等疾 , “It controls ailments such as wild fowl fistula piles , malign sores, jie -illness and xuan -illness”.
